title: Herb + Ohm Luxury Integrative Medicine Practice in Chicago
description: Chicago's Herb + Ohm offers integrative healing with acupuncture and Chinese medicine for nurturing the mind, body, and spirit. Herb + hm is a luxury integrative medicine practice rooted in the wisdom of Traditional Chinese Medicine, adapted to the needs of modern Chicagoans. Our practice nurtures the mind, body, and spirit through Acupuncture + Chinese Herbal Medicine, while recognizing the value and offerings of Western medicine.
cleaned_text: Herb + hm is a luxury integrative medicine practice rooted in the wisdom of Traditional Chinese Medicine, adapted to the needs of modern Chicagoans. Our practice nurtures the mind, body, and spirit through Acupuncture + Chinese Herbal Medicine, while recognizing the value and offerings of Western medicine. At Herb + hm, we realize you may be new to acupuncture. At our practice, we bridge the gap between the familiar and the foreign. We appreciate the distinct advantages of Eastern and Western healing philosophies, while maintaining an optimum balance between the two. This synthesis creates maximum benefits + results for our patients. Sign up with your email address to receive news and updates. We respect your privacy.
